extendedInfo.description: Simply Simon Says is a modern approach to the 1970's hit game Simon. The game is simple and fun to play!Game features include:* High Scores Database: You can keep track of your scores and aim to beat your highest score!* Player lives: This version includes lives, so when you get the Simon Sequence wrong, you lose a live and get another chance with three lives per game!* Clean simple graphics and sounds* Its FREE!I hope you enjoy playing and let me know if you can beat the game! :)

reviews.title: I love playing this game!
reviews.comment: This game reminds me of when I was a kid, it is great to actually have this as an application on my phone, and its free what more can I ask for!  I do like the apps added functionality of lives, it gives the opportunity to play games longer especially after making silly mistakes.   I can monitor how much better I am getting at remembering sequences by entering my scores after a game!  Thank you!
reviews.author: Raymond Leadingham

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This game is amazing! It really makes it easy for you to improve your memory in a fun way.
reviews.author: Alexander Zavyalov

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Fun way to sharpen your memory. Good game. I love it
reviews.author: sujal shakya

reviews.title: My retro life
reviews.comment: Love this app. Reminds me of when I was a child. Thank you
reviews.author: Dean Newstead

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: This game is great for training your memory as well as being fun! It is challenging which makes me play it even more! One of the best simon says games I\'ve played!
reviews.author: Fabienne Naujoks

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love Simon says and this free version is awesome! I like the style and ability to keep track of my scores!  Thanks!
reviews.author: Ray Patrick
